Text:
does this solve following error on level 5:-

"Couldn't find BSP for this map. Please build the fast file associated with mapsmpmp_drone.d3dbsp and try again"

What am I missing here? Ran the batch file and everything went fine, tried running the game's .exe just for shiggles. Black screen, crash. Then, I pasted all the files in FIX folder on top of the game files, and tried launching again. Still a black screen on bootup. Am I supposed on to be on steam? Off steam? What's going on here?
SOMEBODY WHO CAN PLAY PAST INDIA MISSION...PLEASE UPLOAD UR COMPLETED SAVE FILES.
Game works fine but I keep getting "Lui failed to locate from pool" on the Cordis Die mission. It crashes after the car you're in crashes.
wtf?!?! why is a crack fix 10Gbs?!?! I dl'd this thinking it was the single player game, it says to run setup.bat, yet there is no setup.bat. What is this really??
